pageProduct.name: Palmers Shea Butter Hand Cream 60g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Shea Formula Raw Shea Hand Cream is a rich, deeply moisturising hand cream that creates a glove-like protective barrier to seal in moisture, repair cracks and soften overall texture.

Warnings

For external use only. Keep out of reach of children. Avoid contact with eyes.

Common Uses

Formulated with Raw Natural Shea Butter, sustainably sourced in Africa. This rich, super nourishing ingredient is the building block for softer, radiant skin. Provides 24 hour moisture. Paraben and Phthalate Free.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Di-PPG-3 Myristyl Ether Adipate, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Dimethicone, PEG-100 Stearate, Tocopherol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Avena Sativa (Oat) Meal Extract, Isopropyl Myristate, Sodium Polyacrylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fragrance (Parfum), Phenoxyethanol, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sodium Metabisulfite, Lecithin, Sodium Sulfite, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Benzyl Alcohol.

Directions

Apply liberally as often as needed.
